name: G4M3R QU12
description:
Welcome to G4M3R QU12!

(please play game in fullscreen)

A simple quiz game with 50 questions on a variety of topics within the gaming world. Test your knowledge and see if you can answer all 50 questions correctly.

This project was achieved by studying the Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D Online Course by GameDev.tv.

If you would like to learn Unity, you can get the course for a great price here 👉👉 https://www.gamedev.tv/p/unity-2d-game-dev-course-2021/?coupon_code=social&affco...
